title: S&P 500 Advances But Falls Short of Record After Lift From AI
description: US stocks bounced back from a two-day drop but ultimately fell short of reaching a fresh record close on Thursday.
content: US stocks bounced back from a two-day drop but ultimately fell short of reaching a fresh record close on Thursday.
